topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd69e6368722090840d00#post_554bd69e6368722090840d00
BUT NOW I WANT TO GO ALL IN BECAUSE EVERYTHING IS UP AND THERE'S ONLY ONE DAY LEFT IN THIS DAMN CONTEST

BUT I KNOW THAT IF I DO THAT I WILL MOST LIKELY LOSE EVEN WORSE THAN I ALREADY AM

BUT IF I DON'T THEN EVERYONE ELSE WILL CONTINUE TO GO UP WITHOUT ME

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd73763687250d9010400#post_554bd73763687250d9010400

Put just a percentage of your stocks then

If the percentages go as up as you predict they will, it'll still be profitable and if you end up losing, it won't eat your whole investment

BUT I'M NOT GONNA WIN ANYWAYS AND I JUST WANNA FEEL GOOD ABOUT MYSELF GETTING BIG MONEY FOR A DAY

ALL OR NOTHING AT THIS POINT

Murphy's Law dictates that this scenario is unwinnable for me, but there's that infinitely small percentage of hope inside of me that just wants to try

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd8ac63687212d5831100#post_554bd8ac63687212d5831100
BUT I WILL LOSE IF I DO IT

BUT I MIGHT BE ABLE TO PULL AWAY WITH BIG BUCKS IF I DO

BUT IF I DON'T THEN I STILL LOSE

BUT I WILL STILL HAVE A PROFIT AT THE END IF I DON'T

BUT I WON'T BE HIGHER UP IF I DON'T

IT'S A VICIOUS CYCLE OF "WHAT IF"

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd94263687250d9550600#post_554bd94263687250d9550600

Yes there is. Prioritize on what is better

To have a small but still significant profit to invest on the next wave and be able to risk more on the long term, or go for the high risk high reward for short term profit?
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd9e36368722090951100#post_554bd9e36368722090951100
Any profit I gain will pretty much be insignificant in terms of this contest

It's really best for me to not do anything at all at this point, but I really wanna just go 100% because I'm a madman

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bd9c66368722090631100#post_554bd9c66368722090631100
I know but I'm feeling ballsy right now

And I absolutely know I will regret everything by the end of this if I take a chance, but there's that little feeling inside me telling me that I should just for the hell of it
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body: By the way this contest really means nothing overall, it's just a side thing our class has been doing for the fun of it
